oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forrest Park Garden
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Floral Garden, Forrest Park, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image.

“Mrs. Maria L. Ellis -- 739 Madison St. -- Clarksville, -- Tenn. -- There is no value attached to -- the bracelet just a plain old thing -- to decorate my arm whenever I -- think to wear it. We are having -- lovely weather here now but oh! -- the first three days we were home. -- Think I would like to go to Knox. -- again next summer if I could -- have as pleasant a time and meet -- as many friendly people as I did this -- summer -- Barbara Cronin -- 1133 E. Moreland”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Forrest Park; parks; gardens;
